item.title: About
item.description:
whoami

Arnav Dasgupta

Backend Engineer specialized in highly scalable distributed systems in the cloud. Currently building at SAP Labs India.

$ system –info

I am a performance-oriented Software Engineer with over 5 years of experience in designing and scaling service-oriented architectures for enterprise cloud platforms.

My day-to-day involves building the future of context-based, cross-product and internal observability at SAP with the Cloud ALM NGDCI team. I focus on building resilient systems, designing clean API contracts, and engineering high-throughput low latency systems for efficient data transfer. I’m currently looking for new backend opportunities in the EU region.

item.title: The 90% Seek Mystery: Debugging Apple TV on Budget Android Hardware
item.description: I’ve been dealing with a bizarre bug on my Acer Android TV. Every time I try to watch something on the Apple TV app, I hit a wall. I select a title, the spinner goes for about 45 seconds to a minute, and then: “This content could not be played.”
